title: Project Smart Bottle Recycling Cabinet
description: This project developed an intelligent bottle recycling system using image processing technology to detect and classify PET bottles with high accuracy. It features a graphical user interface for real-time data display, a database for transaction storage, and automated notifications via LINE. Additionally, a points-based reward system was implemented through a website to enhance user convenience and engagement.

title: Raspberry Pi Pico: Board Training Set
description: I designed and developed a training kit for learning programming and working with Raspberry Pi Pico. The kit includes 10 essential electronic components, a user manual, and hands-on exercises, making it ideal for students and anyone interested in IoT.
